    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107726</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107726</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205433</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Influence of Memory: Christopher Brown</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Einfluß des Speichers: Christopher 
Braun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'influence de la mémoire : Brun de 
Christopher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A influência da memória: Marrom De 
Christopher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'influenza della memoria: Colore marrone 
Del Christopher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επιρροή της μνήμης: Θ*Θχρηστοπχερ Brown</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La influencia de la memoria: Marrón De 
Christopher</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Spark visits painter Christopher Brown in his studio as he explains his artistic process using memory and photographic images. This Educator Guide is about figurative painting and the evocation of memory in art making.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funken besucht Maler Christopher Braun in seinem 
Studio, während er seinen künstlerischen verwendenden 
Prozeßspeicher und fotographischen Bilder erklärt. Diese 
Erzieher-Anleitung ist über bildlichen Anstrich und die Hervorrufung 
des Speichers beim kunstbilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'étincelle visite le brun de Christopher de 
peintre dans son studio pendant qu'il explique son mémoire 
d'utilisation de processus artistique et images photographiques. 
Ce guide d'éducateur est au sujet de la peinture figurative et 
de l'évocation de la mémoire dans la fabrication d'art.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A faísca visita o marrom de Christopher do pintor
em seu estúdio enquanto explica suas memória se usando process 
artística e imagens fotográficas. Esta guia do educador é 
sobre a pintura figurativa e o evocation da memória em fazer da arte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La scintilla visita il colore marrone del 
Christopher del pittore nel suo studio mentre spiega la sue memoria 
usando trattata artistica ed immagini fotografiche. Questa guida
dell'educatore è circa la pittura figurata ed il evocation della 
memoria nel fare di arte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σπινθήρας επισκέπτεται το ζωγράφο Christopher 
Brown στο στούντιό του δεδομένου ότι εξηγεί την καλλιτεχνική 
διαδικασία του χρησιμοποιώντας τη μνήμη και τις φωτογραφικές 
εικόνες. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών είναι για τη 
μεταφορική ζωγραφική και την επίκληση της μνήμης στην παραγωγή 
τέχνης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La chispa visita el marrón de Christopher del 
pintor en su estudio mientras que él explica su memoria que usa de 
proceso artística e imágenes fotográficas. Esta guía del 
educador está sobre la pintura figurada y el evocation de la memoria 
en la fabricación del arte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205433</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107726</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-influence-of-memory-christopher-brown</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
